basics.name: Carlos Morales Navarro
basics.label: Frontend Developer with over 5 years of experience & Programming Content Creator
basics.summary: Over 5 years of experience as a Web Developer, passionate about helping others learn and grow professionally. Throughout my career, I have worked with various tools and technologies, staying up to date and adapting to the ever-changing industry.
